itemDescription: Canadian ice hockey player and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Robert "Rob" Wilson (born July 18, 1968) is a Canadian-British professional ice hockey coach and a former professional ice hockey defenceman. He is head coach of the Peterborough Petes of the Ontario Hockey League. He is a member of the British ice hockey hall of fame.
